moves.name: swift
moves.effect_entries: Never misses.

moves.name: sunny-day
moves.effect_entries: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

moves.name: substitute
moves.effect_entries: Transfers 1/4 of the user’s max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

moves.name: return
moves.effect_entries: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

moves.name: dream-eater
moves.effect_entries: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: zap-cannon
moves.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: rage
moves.effect_entries: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

moves.name: mega-punch
moves.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: venoshock
moves.effect_entries: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

moves.name: detect
moves.effect_entries: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

moves.name: mega-kick
moves.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: defense-curl
moves.effect_entries: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

moves.name: giga-drain
moves.effect_entries: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

moves.name: growl
moves.effect_entries: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

moves.name: bind
moves.effect_entries: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

moves.name: swords-dance
moves.effect_entries: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages.

moves.name: rock-tomb
moves.effect_entries: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

moves.name: flamethrower
moves.effect_entries: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: hidden-power
moves.effect_entries: Power and type depend upon user’s IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

moves.effect_entries: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

moves.name: close-combat
moves.effect_entries: Lowers the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

moves.name: iron-tail
moves.effect_entries: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

moves.name: hydro-pump
moves.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.name: rest
moves.effect_entries: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

moves.effect_entries: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

moves.effect_entries: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
